mapper.select:
select count(id) from gauntlet where 1=1 and challenger_point is not null
and challenger_student_id=#{studentId}
and challenge_status <> 3 and challenge_status <> 4 and challenge_status <>6
and challenge_status=1
and be_challenger_student_id=#{studentId}
and be_challenger_status <> 3 and be_challenger_status <> 4 and be_challenger_status <> 6
and be_challenger_status = 1

select count(id) from gauntlet where challenger_point is not null
and be_challenger_student_id=#{beStudentId} and challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and challenge_status <>3 and challenge_status <>4 and challenge_status <>6
and be_challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and challenger_student_id=#{beStudentId} and challenge_status <>3 and challenge_status <>4 and challenge_status <>6

select
from gauntlet where challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and be_challenger_student_id=#{beStudentId} and challenge_status=3 and challenger_point is not null limit 1

select
from gauntlet where
((challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and (challenge_status <>3 and challenge_status <> 4 and challenge_status <> 6)) or (be_challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and (be_challenger_status <>3 and be_challenger_status <> 4 and be_challenger_status <> 6)))
((challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and challenge_status =#{type}) or (be_challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and be_challenger_status=#{type}))
and challenger_point is not null order by create_time desc limit #{start},#{end}

select count(id) from gauntlet where ((challenger_student_id = #{studentId} and (challenge_status <> 3 and challenge_status <> 4 and challenge_status <> 6)) or (be_challenger_student_id = #{studentId} and (be_challenger_status <> 3 and be_challenger_status <> 4 and be_challenger_status <> 6))) and challenger_point is not null

select ga.create_time createTime, ga.challenge_status status, stu1.nickname nickName1, stu2.nickname nickname2, ga.challenger_img_url imgUrl1, ga.be_challenger_img_url imgUrl2 from gauntlet ga join student stu1 on ga.challenger_student_id = stu1.id join student stu2 on ga.be_challenger_student_id = stu2.id where ga.challenger_student_id = #{studentId} and ga.type = #{type} order by ga.create_time limit 20

select count(id) from gauntlet where challenger_student_id=#{studentId} and `type`=1
and challenge_status=1
